cleaned_text: Acupuncture Ancient medicine for a healthier tomorrow Auricular (ear) acupuncture can help with substance use (nicotine, opioids, etc.); mental health (depression, anxiety, sleep problems); and trauma. It is a treatment option that is versatile, effective, and economical. We use 5 sterile needles in each ear to stimulate points that help promote physical and emotional well-being. Providers are certified by NADA(National Acupuncture Detoxification Association) $35 per session (for current patients of PCPSB) $50 per session (for non patients of PCPSB) For any questions and to schedule an appointment please give us a call: Evening Session 5:00 pm sessions will be available by appointment only on Thursdays (check- in no later than 5:00pm) and must be made at least 3 days in advance. It is possible, the service may not be with your usual provider on Thursday evenings as they will rotate weeks.
